sensor_frame_residual_only.description: Best result - raw magnetometer minus baseline

world_frame_residual.description: Quaternion rotation to world frame - MUCH WORSE

conclusions: Orientation does NOT help - sensor-frame residual alone achieves 97.8%
World-frame transform HURTS accuracy significantly (52% vs 98%)
Synthetic data HARMS model due to 39% prediction error
Real data collection is the only path to improved coverage
Pre-calibrated residual fields available but provide no advantage
recommendations: Use simple 3-feature sensor-frame residual (mx-bx, my-by, mz-bz)
Abandon synthetic data generation - too inaccurate
Collect real data for remaining 22 finger combinations
Focus on adjacent finger pairs first (easier to perform)
